EmailTemplate.description: this template is used to send eccn-technology's psa/psc value is Project Dependent and psa/psc logic is suspended
EmailTemplate.name: EmailTemplateForPSAPSCValueProjectDependent
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification update for Project Dependent Zone
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello User,
This is to inform you that an ECCN belongs in the PROJECT DEPENDENT ZONE
Device link : {!Device__c.Name}
Last Modified by : {!Device__c.LastModifiedBy}
The PSC/PSA auto-calculation has been suspended.
Please refer Device History for detail information and contact GTC to determine the proper PSC/PSA values.
Thanks, Global Foundries
